name: Global Dialog Internet
title: Sales Executive
description: Managed the web hosting sales and marketing. Led development of all internal and customer facing apps.
responsibilities: Managed web hosting sales, packaging, pricing and promotions.
Delivered seminars to developers on SEO and tracking methodologies.
Training of new telephone tech support personnel.
Business sales of ISDN and T1 Internet services.
accomplishments: I used pricing and plans to double hosting revenue.
I delivered SEO and traffic analysis seminars to web developers.
Developed three applications in ColdFusion, while learning ColdFusion.
learnings: How to move at Internet time.
Good software can be written quickly.
reasonLeft: I left for a development-centric role with twice the pay of my marketing job.
